name: Mobile Optimization OPUX Workflow
description: Systematic mobile optimization using OPUX: Lighthouse audit → Responsive fixes → Tailwind optimization → Verification

steps.title: Lighthouse Mobile Audit - Find Problems
steps.description: Run mobile Lighthouse audit to identify layout, performance, accessibility, and responsive design issues
actions: Run Lighthouse MCP audit on mobile viewport
Generate structured report with specific issues:
Document URLs, selectors, and problem descriptions

steps.title: Responsive Refactor - Fix Layout Issues
steps.description: Convert fixed layouts to responsive designs using mobile-first approach
actions: Identify components with fixed widths or overflow issues
Add breakpoints (sm, md, lg) with mobile-first behavior
Adjust font sizes for mobile readability
Fix viewport meta tag if missing

steps.title: Tailwind Optimizer - Clean Up & Enforce Patterns
steps.description: Normalize and optimize Tailwind CSS usage across components
actions: Replace ad-hoc styles with consistent utilities
Ensure mobile-first responsive classes are used

steps.title: Lighthouse Re-Audit - Verify Improvements
steps.description: Re-run mobile Lighthouse audit to confirm all issues are resolved
actions: Verify all identified issues are fixed

steps.title: Functional Testing - Verify All Features Work
steps.description: Test all tournament functionality on mobile viewport
actions: Test Station Lead View on mobile
